program atcoder_ABC154_A

  implicit none
  character(len=100) :: s1, s2, u
  integer :: a, b

  ! Read first line
  read(*,*) s1, s2

  ! Read second line (a and b)
  read(*,*) a, b

  ! Read third line into u (entire line)
  read(*,'(a100)') u 

  if ( trim(u) == trim(s1) ) then
    print *, a-1, b
  else
    print *, a, b-1
  end if

end program

Let me write the final Fortran code:

```fortran
program main
  implicit none
  character(len=100) :: s1, s2, u
  integer :: a, b

  ! Read the first line
  read(*,*) s1, s2
  ! Read the second line (a and b)
  read(*,*) a, b
  ! Read the third line
  read(*,'(a100)') u

  if (trim(u) == trim(s1)) then
    print *, a-1, b
  else
    print *, a, b-1
  end if

end program main
```
